1299630.name: Operator's Soundtrack
1299630.description:
Operator's Soundtrack features 8 music tracks composed exclusively for the games 911 Operator and 112 Operator. The soundtrack was composed by Krzysztof Kowal and Grzegorz Michalak.

Files are available in WAV - 24 bit, 44100.

Track List:
1. What's your emergency
2. 911 Management theme
3. S&R Management theme
4. S&R Trailer theme
5. 112 Main theme
6. 112 Management theme
7. What_s your emergency (remix)
8. BONUS ELM Miami Concert
